wikipedia_page.main: Howard Reid (born 1951) is a British documentary film maker and anthropologist.He has a PhD from Cambridge University and has made films for the BBC and Channel 4 relating to ancient civilizations and ancient religions.

response: It has also been suggested that the name derives from the German "tragen" or the Dutch "dragen", both being the verb "to carry" in their respective languages. Howard Reid claims the name and role descend from the Latin Draconarius.
* Howard Reid (filmmaker), British documentary film maker and anthropologist
* Howard Reid (admiral), Royal Canadian Navy officer
